chunk: extract), ascorbyl palmitate (vitamin c ester), panthenol (pro-vitamin b5), niacinamide (vitamin b3), salix alba (white willow bark extract), punica granatum (pomegranate seed extract), tocopherol (vitamin e), helianthus annuus (sunflower seed oil), xanthan gum

chunk:
Directions: Apply a thin layer to clean skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off after 5-20 minutes. Follow with toner and moisturize as usual.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1357-Dancing Dingo Detox Active Charcoal Mask (2020 formulation)
